title: Hexblade
content: 10 turns 18m WIS Save Concentration Seeming Lvl 5 Illusion ActionLevel 5 Warlock Spell Slot Disguise up to 4 members of your adventuring party. 18m Telekinesis Lvl 5 Transmutation ActionLevel 5 Warlock Spell Slot Throw a creature or object up to 18m with a thought.
